content: any crafters welcome back to another adventure I'll video now when I was
setting up the shipwreck encounter I really thought it'd be really nice to
have some palm trees on the beach as kind of like set dressing for the you
know for being on a tropical island and I thought that would really just add to
the scene so I came with a really cool idea to make palm trees really super
easy and pretty cheap so let's go to the table and I'll show you how I whip those
up okay guys to start the project I'm using washers I have an inch washer and
an inch and three-eighths washer and I'll get the larger one out and I'm
gonna glue the smaller one the one-inch to the larger washer there we go with my
famous goop and we'll let that dry and work on the next part I'm used pipe
cleaners for this and I don't want the trees would be the same length so when I
bend it over I'm not gonna bend it the same length and what I'm going to use
for the trees are these beads so I got this at the dollar store for a dollar
for this pack so now I'll just glue the pipe cleaner just put some glue on it
spread that out and I'm gonna thread the beads on it okay and when the glue
starts to run out I'll put a little more glue on there and the last piece I'm
going to trim that a little bit because I want it to be open at the top okay so
now I'll just let these dry and then just do as many as I need so here's my
tree it's all dry to do the detail and to give it more strength I'm going to
use the glue gun to run over the surface and this will yeah it'll do both things
it'll give it texture and it'll give it strength just drying it off a little bit
now I'll just continue up the tree there we go so it's all ready to go now
the next phase is to take these and clip the bottoms off I'm using the wire
cutter and get all those set now I've got my bases and I'm using my goop to
glue these tree stems to the washer bases the washer will help give them
weight to hold them up and I use this whole glass jar to lean against so it's
all dried up ready to go now I need to hide that base so I'm going to run
around it with my hot glue gun and this will give like a root texture on it so
it'll be nice make sure you get enough glue on there to cover up that lip of
the two washers touching so you may have to do this in several phases usually I
just by the time I go around its it's already dried or hardened so there we go
got the washers all hidden now I have painted these a flat black the enemy is
a chocolate brown and I'm gonna paint the trees so I'll just paint all these
up and I'm using this fairly wet just to make it go on easier and so I get all
those painted up and now for the bases I'm gonna put them on a pad just to make
it a little easier for me to paint the base without holding it in the air and
it's flipping around say well let those dry and they'll be ready for the next
step alright so they're dried up and we're ready to put some leaves on there
alright so I bought a different couple different plants this one had some nice
firm like foliage so I got a couple of those off there we put some hot glue on
the top glue the first one put some more glue make sure it's nice and secure put
that other one in the center cover up the hole and there we go we have a nice
some nice foliage out of palm tree so it's all set I want to do I want to do a
different couple different one so I have another one here
with some long leaves and I'm gonna glue that to the top same way I'm going to
add some more so I'm gonna use the second piece and I'll glue in the center
there and then stick it in and then cover up that hole with some hot glue
and there we go another variation I'm going to use my chocolate brown again
and cover up that hot glue that I had to use to glue the leaves on so it'll blend
into the tree at the top I'm going to use a light green so I can blend the hot
glue at the top into the the leaves it'll disappear there we go we're all
ready for our next phase the last phase so I'm going to use a tan and it's
actually a coffee I think and I'm gonna paint the stem and the base you see that
detail really popping out there we go there's our first one same thing just
paint it up couldn't be easier alright and that is ready for the table ready
for my beach hmm these are these strange trees Roderick has heard about yummy
coconuts let's see I will climb this tree oh wait I didn't take the climbing
skill but Roderick had a high strength modifier oh I will knock the nuts down
and eat them yummy cocoa nuts
